TuSimple /

      naive-ui---A Vue 3 Component Library. Fairly Complete. Customizable Themes. Uses TypeScript. Not too Slow.

hashicorp /

      terraform---Terraform enables you to safely and predictably create, change, and improve infrastructure. It is an open source tool that codifies APIs into declarative configuration files that can be shared amongst team members, treated as code, edited, reviewed, and versioned.

apple /

      swift-algorithms---Commonly used sequence and collection algorithms for Swift

protocolbuffers /

      protobuf---Protocol Buffers - Google's data interchange format

microsoft /

      playwright---Node.js library to automate Chromium, Firefox and WebKit with a single API

      PaddleHub---Awesome pre-trained models toolkit based on PaddlePaddle.(300+ models including Image, Text, Audio and Video with Easy Inference & Serving deployment)
